name: Narrow Gague
description:
Roll the dice and see what kind of towers you can get to defend the lone water tower in the desert from waves of engineers thirsty for water to power their trains.

Created from scratch by Miles and Riley in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2022. Theme: Roll of the dice.

For the Roll of the dice theme we wanted to have several kinds of dice used to create towers with multiple kinds of upgrades (again based on the dice rolls). The time-imposed scope of the project forced the several kinds of dice we envisioned to be pared down to just the tower die, rolling to determine what kind of towers were built.
